dict.acceptation: 大大地；夸大地；详细地；顺风地；
大的；大规模的；大型号的；广泛的；
玩个痛快；（尤指跳舞和饮酒）作乐；

sent.orig: That is the thesis of Anatole Kaletsky an editor-at-large for The Times and a prolific commentator.
sent.trans: 这是阿纳托莱？卡列茨基(AnatoleKaletsky)的观点。卡列茨基是《泰晤士报》(TheTimes)的自由编辑(editor-at-large)，也是一位多产的评论员。

sent.orig: The Three Gorges Project is a large-scale project with long construction period and large investment demand.
sent.trans: 三峡工程规模巨大，建设工期长，投资需求大。

sent.orig: Kakichi Express as a modern large-scale logistics enterprises, Shanghai Kakichi Express has a large fleet.
sent.trans: 佳吉快运作为现代化的大型第三方物流企业，上海佳吉快运拥有庞大的运输车队。

sent.orig: A large scale turbidite body sedimented in Es 3 forming a large scale turbidity sandstone oilfield.
sent.trans: 沙三段沉积了一个大型浊积岩体，形成了一个大型浊积砂岩油田。

sent.orig: The large intensity of scattering reveals the large nonlinear optic character.
sent.trans: 拉曼光谱大的散射强度说明晶体有大的非线性光学特性。
